name: Fourchette
description: Fourchette combines Heroku forking and GitHub pull requests to create a test app for each pull request.!

FOURCHETTE_GITHUB_PROJECT.description: The github project to watch for notifications from

FOURCHETTE_GITHUB_USERNAME.description: The github username for the project. Note this user needs to be an admin of the repo to be able to add, enable or disable the web hook used by Fourchette. You could create it by hand if you prefer.

FOURCHETTE_GITHUB_PERSONAL_TOKEN.description: A personal token for Fourchette to comment on the PR's with URLs to your fork. Get one here https://github.com/settings/applications.

FOURCHETTE_HEROKU_APP_TO_FORK.description: The name of the source app for forking

FOURCHETTE_HEROKU_APP_PREFIX.description: A custom prefix for your forks, use it to namespace your forks. By default they'll be named 'fourchette-pr-1234' where '1234' is the PR number. Beware, the name can't be more than 30 characters total! It will be changed to be lowercase only, so you should probably just use lowercase characters anyways.
